## IColorChannel interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IColorChannel<T extends TypedArray, C> 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getChannel(id)](./pixel.icolorchannel.getchannel.md) | Returns new pixel buffer of selected color channel. The extracted values are a copy of the original. |
|  [setChannel(id, buf)](./pixel.icolorchannel.setchannel.md) | Replaces selected color channel with values from given pixel buffer, which MUST be of same size as target. |
